metadata.Title: CVE-2016-2827 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
The mozilla::net::IsValidReferrerPolicy function in Mozilla Firefox before 49.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read and application crash) via a Content Security Policy (CSP) referrer directive with zero values.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-2827` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 49.0+build4-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-globalmenu - 49.0+build4-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-mozsymbols - 49.0+build4-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-testsuite - 49.0+build4-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '49.0+build4-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
